title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman's yard, side of the house, day. The fourth grade boys are gathered there for some reason

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I don't know, that looks pretty high up.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yeah. I think it'd be better to start lower.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Dude, I really don't think it's smart, Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This is gonna be totally cool, you guys.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: It's not gonna work; just come down from there.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: ...Geez, this looks a lot higher from up here.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What's going on?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman thinks he can fly off of his roof.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Do it! Do it!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm gonna.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I wouldn't if I were you.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Those wings don't look very strong.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Don't listen to 'em, Cartman! I'm sure it'll work. Go for it. Yaaay Cartman! Fly fly fly!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Okay, here we go.  Since the days of Copernicus, man has dreamed of flight. On this historic day, let us go on to

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Awww, go on and do it already!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hold on, I'm givin' my speech! On this historic day, we remember the Wright Brothers: Orville and Redenbacher, whose dreams and visions inspired generations.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: He's not gonna do it.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: And now, again, one man's vision ushers in a new era of aerial travel, proving the power of imagination and intellect. The magic... of flight!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, day. Cartman is in a recovery room with bruises on his face and a black left eye. The medical staff attends him. Outside, Mrs. Cartman appears and rushes in to see Cartman

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh my God! Eric! Eric,  Mommy's here. Sweetie?  Oh what's wrong with him?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm afraid that your son is... incredibly stupid. He thought he could fly with cardboard wings. The stupidity is so severe that it caused a fall, which has... put him into a deep coma.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Coma... My God, for- for how long?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: There's no telling. He may never recover. We'll just have to wait. And see.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hell's Pass, some time later. The camera pans down back onto Cartman, who is now covered in facial hair and a bandage around his head.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Seasons change, time passes by.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
role: As the weeks become the months become the years.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Eugh...

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh my... Doctor!  He's awake!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Wheh? Where am I?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh, you've finally come back! It's a miracle!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You're at the hospital, Eric. You've... been in a coma for some time.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Coma... How long?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: It's been two days. Nurse, you can remove his face-warmer now.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yse, Doctor.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Now, Eric, you've suffered massive head traume. Your road to recovery will be long and arduous. At least another two days.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Seasons change, time passes by.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
role: As the weeks become the months become the years.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You're doing so much better, muffin.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Why the hell do I have to share my room with other patients? This is bullcrap!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh, you're sounding just like your old self again.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm sorry, detectives, there was nothing we could do.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Damnit! Another murder victim! For three years the Left-Hand killer has been at large and I've exhausted every lead! Maybe... I just don't have what it takes to be a cop anymore.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: We'd better get back to the station, sir.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Good, because you assholes have kept me up for three hours!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right, let's go, Murphy. Hang on a second, where are, where are my car keys?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Probably in your front pocket, dumbass!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Doctor, didn't you say that kid suffereed head trauma?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yes, it was pretty severe.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What is it, Lou?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I've... heard cases where people suffering head trauma awaken to some psychic abilities.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Aw, come on, sir.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I know it's ridiculous , but I'm gonna explore every possibility I can.  Hello, young man, could we have a quick word with you?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Not now! The nurse is gonna walk in any minute with my lunch.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Twelve-thirty, Eric. Lunch time.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Young man, how did you know the nurse was gonna walk in just now?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I don't know, I just knew it.  Aww man, this smells like meatloaf. Again?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yep, meatload again.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Jesus, how did he...?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Little boy...  Well it's a snowball's chance in hell but...  we were wondering if you could come down and see if your... new powers could help us catch the killer.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: His new... powers?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Stark's Pond, newly restored from the demolished Wall*Mart, much bigger than it was before, night. A crime scene at the docks is shown, complete with boat floating around

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right, make sure you get pictures of everything in this crime scene.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Who's the kid?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: He's supposed to be some kind of psychic.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Aw Christ.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This is... where the body was found. Multiple stab wounds, just like all the others.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: How come the outline is missing its hand?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: The killer always cuts off the left hand of his victim, and keeps it as a trophy.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Stand back, give him room!  Come on, kid, concentrate! What do you see in your mind?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman begins to concentrate and his eyes begin to twitch. First he sees a muffing with chocolate topping and sprinkles, then powdered doughnuts, then a cup of vanilla ice cream - with sprinkles being added

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Ice cream. Covered with... chocolate sprinkles...  Double-Stuff Oreos... He ... He's taking the top of one and... ...and he puts it together to make Quadruple-Stuffs!  I see...ice cream, and sprinkles, and Quadruple-Stuffs!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Jesus Christ!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sir?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Tom Johannsen, the owner of the ice cream shop!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Mr. Johansen's house, night. The detectives ring his doorbell and he answers

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yes? Oh, hello, detectives.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Mr. Johansen, could we have a quick word with you?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Wuhsure, come on in.  I'm afraid the house is a little bit of a disaster area since I have

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Get him!  Code 6! Code 6!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Use the taser! Use the taser!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Do it again!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Mr. Johansen's house outside, front. Police cars and vans have gathered outside and the siren lights are still rotating

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: He put up a hell of a fight, but we got him!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Why? Why??

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Congratulations, Eric. You just stopped the biggest killer in South Park history.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: We would give you a reward, but I guess that knowing the people of South Park are safe again is reward enough.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Guess again.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right, here's a hundred dollars.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Wow!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: His powers are uncanny. Take good care of him, Ms. Cartman. Make sure he uses his powers for good.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh he will. My little poopsiekins is a very good little boy.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: South Park Elementary, day. The school bell rings. Cartman runs down the hall dressed in a bath robe and using a cane

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm a psychic and you are worse. I have super-awesome powers. You don't.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman, what did you do?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh, didn't you hear, Kyle? I used my new psychic abilities to catch the serial killer. And I made a hundred bucks!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Nice old Mr. Johansen runs a candy shop! He wasn't a killer and you know it!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Then why did I see ice cream and cookies when I closed my eyes?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Because you're a fucking fatass, that's why?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Do not doubt my powers, Kyle!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You don't have any powers!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Don't make me do it, Kyle! I can make your head explode with a single thoght!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Wuh be careful, Kyle.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: He can't do crap!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Fine, Kyle! You asked for it! Hee-at!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: There he is! Hey, Eric!  We've got a little problem.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: While the ice-cream store owner was in jail, another murder was commited.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This body also had a missing hand and a bowl of corn flakes next to it!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Which can only mean one thing!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Ha! You see?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: That a copycat killer is on the loose! We need your psychic abilities to catch this new guy right away!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: We'll pay you up front this time! We've gotta catch this new guy before he kills again.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm afraid that my powers... are not for sale. ...And by that I mean they absolutely are for sale. Let's go!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Field report

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Tom, I'm standing in a meadow just outside of town where police have discovered the first victim of the serial copycat killer. Child wunderkind Eric Cartman is now arriving on the scene.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: The crime scene

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This is fuckin' ridiculous!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Whattaya got, wunderkind? Are ya seeing anything?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: No. Nothing.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Maybe his powers have left him.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yeah.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Wait a minute.  Fried chicken. It's tender and it's fresh.  There's maple syrup... Maple syrup's being put on the chicken.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What the hell is wrong with these people?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: They're never gonna catch the serial killer. He's too smart. Do you want to see my cotton panties?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hey! What about this guy?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Quiet! He's havin' a vision!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: It is fried chicken!  Oh my God. It's a fried chicken sundae.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: "Junior, what are you doing out?" I'm sorry, Mother. "You come home rigtht now and have sex with me!" No, Mommy!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hey, uh, does anyone know who that guy is?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I said quiet, you little brat, or I'll have you arrested for interfering with the law!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: The News 4 logo and screen come up on a TV

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This is Park County News 4, with your host, Jim Brown-ish

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: The copycat killer of the cut-off-the-left-hand killer has been arrested. Police used the help of Eric Cartman, a wunderkind psychic detective. At the crime scene, the young psychic had visions flash before his mind, and the police immiedately arrested the owner of Kentucky Fried Chicken. The young man's visions were so astounding that other police departments have sought out his help.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman's house, day. He's in his room counting the money he's made from his psychic work

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: If I'm happy and I know it, clap my hands. *clap* *clap* If I'm happy and I know it, clap my hands. *clap* *clap*

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Eric, sweetie, there's um, some people here to see you.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: More people need to make use of my phenomenal gifts, huh? Ahhh, it's so very tiring.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Ah, no, these people claim that they are the "real" psychic detectives.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Living room, moments later. Liane and Cartman enter

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: So, you are the little boy who's been taking all our work?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oooh, I'll go make some tea.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Kid, we have a problem. You didn't go through the proper channels to become a psychic detective like we all did.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yeah!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Proper channels?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You were supposed to fill out the form on the back of the comic book and pay the twenty five dollar fee for the degree from the Psychic Detective School.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I was given my gift from a tragic accident. I didn't need to go to Psychic Detective School.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Well you just can't say you're a psychic detective, you have to use the ad in the comic book!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You must pay the twenty five dollar fee and give us ten percent of yoru earnings!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Ten percent my balls, get lost!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Very well, then you give us no choice. Roger?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Roger steps out from behind the sofa and prepares to battle Cartman psychically. Cartman simply observes, then responds. He and Roger battle with sound effects and hand gestures

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right everyone!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh, poopsies, what's going on?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Stand back, mother! We're having a telekinetic battle of minds!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: O-o-o-o-o-oh!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Enough!  We are ...obviously quite evenly matched. I guess this will have to be settled in court.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: In court?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: We brought a class-action lawsuit against you! We'll see you before the judge tomorrow!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Is it over?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: A camera shutter is heard and a picture of Ms. Crabtree appears, with blood next to her left cheek. It looks like someone shot her through the side of the head and her left hand is missing. A detectuve continues taking pictures

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Her name is... Veronica Crabtree, busdriver for the elementary school. She was considered an ancillary character, one the fans wouldn't miss much.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Jesus Christ! Cause of death?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Same MO, sir. Multiple stab wounds, left hand cut off and missing.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: So you're telling me somebody new is now copying the crimes of the copycat killer?! Jesus! Where will it end?! Every time I put a killer behind bars, another guy just steps in and takes his place! What am I doing wrong?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Excuse me, sir? I think I know who did this. We saw this guy at the last crime scene, and, and you know how serial killers sometimes return to the scene of the crime? Well, I followed this guy to his house, and when he left again, I collected some fingerprints and did a blood-sample analysis.  I'm pretty sure he's your man.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: How do you know?? Are you psychic??

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: No.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Look, kid, don't waste my time with your blood-sampling fingerprinty hocus-pocus! I have to find this new killer now! I owe it to that victim over there! I know she hadn't been in any recent episodes, but DAMNIT she deserved better than this! Come on, Murph, we've gotta talk to Eric Cartman again!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Why won't anybody listen to me?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: (Don't take it personally, Kyle)

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I AM taking it personally because Cartman is a retard! Just because he hit his head and went into a coma doesn't mean he's a- Wait, that's it. If I want people to listen to me, I just have to be as stupid as Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Kyle's house, later. Kyle is standing at the edge of the roof at the side of his house, sporting his own cardboard wings

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Dude, I really don't think that's a good idea!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: There has to be another way!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Be sure to take me to the same hospital!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Now Kyle, don't fly too close to the sun, or it'll burn your wings, an- and you'll crash into the ocean.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Butters, Goddamnit.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right, here we go.  Since the days of Copernicus, man has dreamed of flight. On this historic day we rerme- aw screw it!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Call an ambulance.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Channel 4 News. A picture of handcuffs is shown, with "ARRESTS MADE" above it

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Multiple arrests were made today for the murder of Hillary Neals. Police raided the South Park Motel 6 at 4 a.m., where seven psychic detectives were staying.  The psychic detectives' horrible crime was found out by psychic detective Eric Cartman , who is now the only psychic not behind bars. What an amazing coincidence.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cartman watches the news from the sofa in the living room at his house

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Cool.  Ah, Kyle is at the door. Come in, Kyle!  Who are you?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You, you give everyone else credit for my work, because you fail to see my greatness.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: ... 'K. Sweet.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Because of you, nobody knows the extent of my deeds.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh yeah. Awesome. Hold on, just a second. Mom, there's some homeless guy here. Make him go away.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Next scene is an unknown place. Cartman is strapped down to a wheelchair. He awakens and struggles a bit

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hey. Hey, what's goin' on??

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You are obviously a big fan of my work.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I don't even know you dude!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: But I am the serial killer! The one whose rightful place in history you have smirched!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh Jesus.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: And now you will have a place of honor, as my nineteenth victim.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: No! No, you don't wanna kill me. Please, I'll give you anything you want!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Before you die, let me show you the things that I've done, so you will understand the breadth of my transformation!  This... is me at the grand canyon.  Do you see? This is me at Mount Rushmore  Do you see?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Heheh.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Do you see??

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yes yes, I see!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Here I am at the Alamo in San Antonio. This was just outside of the gift shop. Do you see??

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: AAAAAAAH!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Park County Police Station, night

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Damnit! Damnit all to hell! They just found another body! That means a fifth copycat killer is on the loose! Where's my psychic?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sorry, Sarge, the psychic's mom says her son hasn't been home for a couple of hours.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sir! Dr. Kels just called from the hospital! He says another little boy just awoke from a coma, and is having psychic visions!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Let's go!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, later. Dr. Kels leads them into the recovery room

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This is the young man here. He was in a coma for over sixteen hours.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Doctor, could you remove his face warmer? We'd like to speak with him.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Of course. Nurse?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Young man, the doctor said you've had some... visions about our newest murder?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I see... a man... with a baseball cap. He's killing now... Oh! I'm seeing it all flash before my eyes! The guy's name is Michael Deets, and he lives at 621 Castillo Street. He's usually there between seven and eleven p.m.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: What do you think, Mitch?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I don't know. How do we know this kid is really psychic? I mean, this boy is certainly no Eric Cartman.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: All right, we'll check this Deets guy out. But let's use that one thing that we never use.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: ...Sir?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You know, what's that one thing that starts with an R that we never use?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: ...Restraint?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yeah yeah, restraint. We'll check this guy out, but let's use some restraint.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Mr. Deets' basement. He's still showing Cartman his slides

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Look! Look at the things I've done! Here I am at Yellowstone National Park! Do you see?! Here are pictures of my trip to Cheyenne for Frontier Days. Do you see?!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh my God! I'm so bored! Somebody help me!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Good evening, sir. We're Park County detectives. We were just wondering if we could take a quick look around your house, Misterrr...

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: God.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Well Mr. God, it won't take but a second; it might help us with an investigation.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: (Hey! Come over here!)

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I see you like cutting the eyes out of photos of women. My son is a big fan of that too.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sarge! In here!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Jesus H.... That boy was right! Arrest that guy!  Whoawhoawaitwaitheywait wait yo! Oh wait a minute, no ah, I'm wrong.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sir?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: This isn't the guy. The serial killer always cuts off the victims' left hands.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Right.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Well those aren't left hands.  See, on your left hand, the thumb faces to the left. Those are all right hands.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Ohhh.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Nope, this isn't our man.  We're sorry, Mr. God. It appears we've wasted your time.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: (Hey! Get me out of here!)

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Heh, pretty amazing coincidence that guy had a bunch of hands on his wall. Heh, no wonder that boy thought he was a killer.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yeah... Amazing coincidence...

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Heh- sir?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Call it police intuition, but sonethin' in there just didn't feel right.  Wait a minute.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Sarge...  What is it?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: I'm not sure. I'm gonna have to run some tests.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Park County Police Station, night. Montage. Lou types away at his computer, then analyzes his left hand again, then returns to the keyboard. He then goes to the lab and looks over his notes. Next to him are two hands, one right and one left. He rotates the right hand so both thumbs point to the left, from his POV, then takes more notes. He develops some pictures in the darkroom and finds matching hands. He works with a 3D model drawing with another computer, then traces his left hand on a wall and takes measurements. He returns to the lab and works with some chemicals. Next he chops some firewood into smaller chunks. Next he's at a gym jumping rope. Next he's at a beach far from South Park playing volleyball with some women. Next he's repairing the body of a car with a welding torch...

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Murphy, do you remember what I was supposed to be doing?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh. Uhhh... Oh. Something about hands, sir? Uh for the serial killer?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh right! The hands! Right!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Again he goes to his computer and types awaym then he's back at the lab taking pictures of the two fake hands there, then makes silhouettes of a dog, then models another hand in the computer and gets a match

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Oh my God. Murphy!  You're not gonna believe this.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Mr. Deets' house, basement. Mr. Deets has resumed showing his pictures to Cartman. A picture of him at Ocean World's Splash Zone is shown, then a blank. He turns the projector off

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: That's it, no more pictures.  Time to die.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: No, please! I'm sorry I gave other people credit for your killings. Ahah, it was, it was very wrong for me to lie about the other psychics and get them arrested.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Your hand will be one with the others.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Please just let me go! Ah I'm gonna tell everyone I'm not really psychic! I've learned my lesson! Please, I don't wanna-  I don't wanna have to use my psychic mind missile on you!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hold it right there, killer!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You got here just in time. He was gonna kill me because he was insanely jealous of my incredible psychic ability.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, day. The detectives, the psychics, Cartman, Stan, and Kenny

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Well young man, you did an amazing thing. Not only did your psychic visions help us catch the killer, but a lot of innocent people are out of jail.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yes, thank you very much, Kyle.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Yes, thanks.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You're certainly a better psychic then Eric.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: No, don't you see? Cartman never had psychic visions. And neither do these people. The plain simple truth is that nobody is psychic. There's a logical explanation for every psychic story you've ever heard.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Do you think that's true?

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: It must be true. The kid is psychic. But I don't suppose it really matters much. Because in the end, the way I caught the killer was with... good old-fashioned police work. Come on, Murphy.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Well young man, I guess that just leaves one score to settle.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: You can't hurt me.

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Then let this be our final battle!

title: CARTMAN S INCREDIBLE GIFT
text: Just stop it!  Stoopp iitt!!  There's a logical explanation for that.
